rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Bohemian accents and ambient lighting to greet visitors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan area featuring vibrant Bohemian decor, large windows for natural light, and comfortable seating arrangements. Ideally placed adjacent to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a Bohemian-inspired layout that enhances community dining experiences.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional and aesthetically pleasing kitchen designed in line with local culinary practices and Vastu principles. Placed on the northeast side for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom located near the entrance for ease of access and privacy.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open space designed to invite natural light and ventilation, fostering a serene outdoor living area with lush greenery and seating arrangements.

openings.description: A wide, inviting door that enhances the flow of natural light between spaces.
Large windows installed to promote ample natural light in accordance with Vastu principles for positive energy distribution.
A functional door ensuring easy passage while maintaining a separation between cooking and dining spaces.
Small window for natural light and ventilation, following privacy norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious and comfortable master bedroom designed with Bohemian elegance. Placed on the east side for optimal morning sunlight, in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet and well-lit library area featuring bookshelves, a reading nook, and decor that reflects the Bohemian aesthetic. Placed near the living room for easy access.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom attached to the master bedroom with modern fixtures and Vastu-aligned design elements.

openings.description: A centrally located staircase ensuring efficient movement between levels, designed in line with Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Large windows on the east side to maximize sunlight and adhere to Vastu principles.
